casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Antonia MILLER 2PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Miller, Juan Antonia. John G. Batherson, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Ivy Johnson, Ian Mance, Attorneys at Law, for Beloved Community Center of Greensboro. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State.

*109The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of October 2017 by Defendant to Strike Transcript of State's Exhibit 2 and All References from the State's Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
